name: book-tracking-app
description: ### User Stories:  - As a user, I want to be able to search for books - As a user I want to be able to add books from my search results to my list of books to read, or books I have read - As a user, I want to track books I have read - As a user, I need to be able to rate books I have read - As a user, I want to be able to make a list of books I want to read
author: Sarah Mendez
